description:
An expressive trucker hat for active kids who groove on the outdoors.

  • Foam-backed polyester front panel features original art by Sato Designers
  • Nylon brim dries quickly
  • Mesh back lets cool air flow through
  • Adjustable snapback closure fits kids 2-7 years old
name: Ambler Actimals Trucker Hat - Children to Youths
